description: This file configures ESLint settings for a Next.js project, extending core web vitals and TypeScript configurations using @eslint/eslintrc's FlatCompat.

methods.name: dirname
methods.description: Returns the directory name of a path.

methods.name: fileURLToPath
methods.description: Converts a file URL to a file path.

methods.name: compat.extends
methods.description: Extends ESLint configs based on provided profile names.
